Title: Grow Up
Genre: Adventure, Casual, Indie
Developer: Reflections, a Ubisoft Studio
Publisher: Ubisoft
Release Date: 16 Aug, 2016
Release Name : Grow Up-PLAZA
Size : 500 MB

Minimum:
OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8.1 or Windows 10(64bit versions)
Processor: Intel i3 550 @ 3.2 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 955 @ 3.2 GHz
Memory: 4 GB RAM
